website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable waistband and bike-friendly length makes these a solid choice.
pros: Fabric remains opaque even when exercising or bending over
Wicks moisture away from the skin
cons: A few wearers say they show cellulite through the fabric

customer_reviews.title: Pilling in thigh area
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of lululemon leggings. I am a size 12 and 5' 4" and these fit great. There is a little pilling in the inner thigh area, but seems to be the case when your thighs rub together in lululemon leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: don't stay up
customer_reviews.text: i am so disapointed as they felt so good when i tried them on but doing yoga in them......well after one time that was the last time it took for me. They kept peeling down .I was constanty pulling the high waistband up while practicing yoga. I really bit hard for the purchase as they are so pricy but I thought it would be worth it. Good for leggings but not yoga. bummed out.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love the way they adjust to my body... I am far from thin, I have a curvy body but these leggings make me feel sexy and happy
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Dieguez

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! ! So very comfortable I wish I could wear them 24hrs a day. Planning on giving my sister a pair for her birthday. She will love them too.
customer_reviews.author: Joene David

customer_reviews.title: Great fit in all the right places!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and great fit! They’re snug in all the right places. Shipping speed was great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gentile

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy the product unless you tried it.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked this product due to is too tight and keep slipping down when I walk and jogging. I wish I can return for full refund. I paid $138 for product is not as good Nike product which I less for it.
customer_reviews.author: Va Vangyi

customer_reviews.title: Good but short
customer_reviews.text: The leggings is a little shorter than expected. Always try them in store before you buy
customer_reviews.author: RONNIE

customer_reviews.title: Refund
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for $138, it did not fit properly so i returned it and only received $1.08 back. Why????
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great leggings - crappy seller
customer_reviews.text: Great overall fit but I returned because this seller was over priced by about $30.00. I don't suggest using this seller as they charged me for return postage.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect and the product feels so soft. Love it
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Paid too much, they did not fit my wife very well.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Buss

customer_reviews.title: I love these leggings
customer_reviews.text: I love these leggings, the price is a bit of a shock since they are just leggings...but they feel SO good on and look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I wish they came in navy blue too
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Run big
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if they stretched out or run big but I cannot wear them because the fall down. I would order them again but a size down. Also the price was much higher than from the company.
customer_reviews.author: jennie briggs

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but i can obviously see the trace of my underwear
customer_reviews.text: This must be a great quality ! I just wish it wasnt see through! Im wearing a seamless underwear or even thong but i can see the trace unlike my other lululemon leggings. But if you wont mind this part then this should be a great one!
customer_reviews.author: Naio81

customer_reviews.title: they absolutely love them! I bought 2 more pairs and am ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2 daughters who are normally a 4. I ended up having to switch for an 8 so the only suggestion is to order a little larger. That being said, they absolutely love them! I bought 2 more pairs and am now waiting for their size to come in again to get another. And Melissa was extremely patient with me with my exchanges! I will definitely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Shear fabric shows more than you might intend
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are pretty shear, as in, a bit see through. A kind woman at my yoga class let me know!! Comfortable but for the price, kind of a bummer I have to make sure I layer with a long tank.
customer_reviews.author: M. Moran

product_meta.title: Lululemon High Times Pant Full On Luon 7/8 Yoga Pants
product_meta.description: Lululemon designed these pants to help us move from Hatha to happy hour, no questions asked. With a high-rise fit that keeps us covered as we bend, twist and sip, these pants have our back when post-practice drinks turn into impromptu dance parties. ..These are Lululemon's best selling 7/8 length pant. They are absolutely great for running, biking, and other cardio work and even better for just wearing around the house. They are both comfortable and flattering. Measurements: 26" inseam, overall length 36" from waist to cuff. Size 4 Waist: 26" Size 6 Waist: 28" Size 8 Waist: 30" Size 10 Waist: 32" Size 12 Waist: 34" Stretches another 2+ inches more.
feature_bullets: Lululemon designed these pants to help us move from Hatha to happy hour, no questions asked. With a high-rise fit that keeps us covered as we bend, twist and sip, these pants, formerly known as the Wunder Under High-Rise Pant and now called the Wunder Under Hi-Rise 7/8 Tight, have our back when post-practice drinks turn into impromptu dance parties.
Luon fabric is four-way stretch, sweat-wicking and gives incredible support and coverage. Added LYCRA fibre bends with you and stays in great shape.
The smooth, wide waistband lies flat against your skin. Flat seams help keep chafe in check—go ahead, bust a move.
7/8 length is bike-friendly and stays out of your way. Stash your keys and gym pass in our signature waistband pocket.
